flags.title: User-Contributed Project

guide.introduction:
this guide is about making an MP4 archive copy of your favorite dvds

the archives you create can be played on your itunes or iphone or whichever

media player or cellphone you have

the only prerequsite is that the device has to support MP4s
guide.introduction_rendered:
this guide is about making an MP4 archive copy of your favorite dvds

the archives you create can be played on your itunes or iphone or whichever

media player or cellphone you have

the only prerequsite is that the device has to support MP4s

Tools
  • DVD43 download from GOOGLE.COM
  • handbrake.fr downloaded from GOOGLE.COM

lines.text: download and install handbrake software from this location http://handbrake.fr/
